$TSM March Revenues Surge https://www.digitimes.com/news/a20180410VL204.html

$SOXX $SOXL $SOXS $NVDA $QCOM $AVGO $INTC $AAPL

links.title: TSMC March revenues surge
links.description: TSMC March revenues surge Jessie Shen, DIGITIMES, Taipei Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) has reported consolidated revenues for March 2018 of about NT$103.7 billion (US$3.55 billion), up 60.4% sequentially and 20.8% on year, and hitting a record high. TSMC's consolidated sales for the first quarter of 2018 totaled NT$248.08 billion, rising 6.1% on year.

links.title: Why Shares of Energous Corp. Are Surging Today
links.description: Shares of Energous Corp. (NASDAQ: WATT) jumped on Tuesday after the wireless charging company disclosed that the Federal Communications Commission had certified its WattUp Near Field transmitter. This comes a few months after the FCC certified the company's Mid Field transmitter. The stock was up about 10% at 12:15 p.m.

messages.body: $VHC $AAPL https://9to5mac.com/2018/04/10/apple-ordered-to-pay-patent-troll-virnetx-502-6m-in-ongoing-infringement-case/

links.title: Apple ordered to pay patent troll VirnetX $502.6M in ongoing infringement case
links.description: Apple's never-ending battle with notorious patent troll VirnetX continues today. According to a new report from Bloomberg, an Eastern Texas court has ruled that Apple infringes on four VirnetX patents and must pay $502.6 million in damages... The report says that the patents in question relate to Apple's FaceTime, VPN, and iMessage services.

messages.body: $AAPL https://seekingalpha.com/article/4162179-apple-time-cash-flood

links.title: Apple: Time For The Cash Flood
links.description: When Apple ( AAPL) reports FQ2 results for the period ending March on May 1, the tech giant is set to outline the capital allocation plans after tax repatriation. The cash flood could be the catalyst for the stock soaring to $200 and becoming the first stock to top the $1 trillion mark in market cap.
